entry.tran: (正常尺寸、标准量度的)四分之三的
entry.def: You can use three-quarter to describe something which is three fourths of the usual size or three fourths of a standard measurement.

example.ex: Choose short or three-quarter sleeves for summer.
example.tran: 夏天穿短袖或七分袖的衣服。

example.ex: ...a session which lasted one and three-quarter hours.
example.tran: 持续 1 小时 45 分钟的会议
